trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_DATABASE_PROPERTY</codeph> function fetches the value of the specified property of the database on the current connection.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_DATABASE_PROPERTY</codeph> function fetches the value of the specified property of the database on the current connection.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_DATABASE_PROPERTY</codeph> function fetches the value of the specified property of the database on the current connection.

trans-unit.source: If the value that was set for the property is invalid, the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_DATABASE_PROPERTY</codeph> function returns the invalid value, but <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value.

seg-source.mrk: If the value that was set for the property is invalid, the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_DATABASE_PROPERTY</codeph> function returns the invalid value, but <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value.

target.mrk: If the value that was set for the property is invalid, the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_DATABASE_PROPERTY</codeph> function returns the invalid value, but <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value.

trans-unit.source: An error will be returned if KEY is null.

seg-source.mrk: An error will be returned if KEY is null.

target.mrk: An error will be returned if KEY is null.

trans-unit.source: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this function by default. See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information. The database owner can grant access to other users.

seg-source.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this function by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

target.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this function by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.
